code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({id:"",category:"",genre:"",type:""});const[selectedFiles,setSelectedFiles]=useState([]);const[uploadStatus,setUploadStatus]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleFileChange=e=>{setSelectedFiles(e.target.files);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setUploadStatus("");if(!selectedFiles||selectedFiles.length===0){setUploadStatus("Please select at least one file.");return;}const data=new FormData();Object.entries(formData).forEach(_ref=>{let[key,value]=_ref;data.append(key,value);});Array.from(selectedFiles).forEach(file=>{data.append("files",file);});try{const response=await axios.post("https://api.malidag.com/upload-header",data,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"}});setUploadStatus("✅ Upload successful!");console.log(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error uploading files:",error);setUploadStatus("❌ Error uploading files. Please try again.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:"500px",margin:"auto",padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Upload Header Images"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[["id","category","genre","type"].map(field=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{style:{textTransform:"capitalize"},children:[field,":"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:field,value:formData[field],onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{width:"100%",padding:"8px",marginTop:"5px"}})]},field)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Upload Images:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",multiple:true,onChange:handleFileChange,required:true,style:{width:"100%",padding:"8px",marginTop:"5px"}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{padding:"10px 20px",cursor:"pointer",backgroundColor:"#007bff",color:"#fff",border:"none",borderRadius:"4px"},children:"Upload"})]}),uploadStatus&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginTop:"10px",fontWeight:"bold"},children:uploadStatus})]});}export default Header;
